verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> that they <S%H5144>separate<s%> themselves from the <S%H6944>holy<s%> things of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and that they <S%H2490>profane<s%> not my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> in those things <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H6942>hallow<s%> to me: I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H559>Say<s%> to them, <S%H376>Whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> he be of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> among your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> that <S%H7126>goes<s%> to the <S%H6944>holy<s%> things, <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6942>hallow<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> having his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> on him, that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from my <S%H6440>presence:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H376>What<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> soever of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> is a <S%H6879>leper,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> has a <S%H2100>running<s%> <S%H2100>issue;<s%> he shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> things, <S%H5704>until<s%> he be <S%H2891>clean.<s%> And whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> thing that is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> by the <S%H5315>dead,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H7902>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> <S%H3318>goes<s%> from him;

<S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H376>whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H8318>creeping<s%> thing, <S%H834>whereby<s%> he may be made <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> he may take <S%H2930>uncleanness,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> he has;

The <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has <S%H5060>touched<s%> any such shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>even,<s%> and shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> things, <S%H3588>unless<s%> <S%H518><s%> he <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H935>down,<s%> he shall be <S%H2891>clean,<s%> and shall <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> things; <S%H3588>because<s%> it is his <S%H3899>food.<s%>
That which <S%H5038>dies<s%> of itself, or is <S%H2966>torn<s%> with <S%H2966>beasts,<s%> he shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> himself therewith; I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

They shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4931>ordinance,<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> they <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> for it, and <S%H4191>die<s%> therefore, <S%H3588>if<s%> they <S%H2490>profane<s%> it: I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them.

There shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2114>stranger<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> thing: a <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> of the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> or an <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>servant,<s%> shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> thing.

But <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7069>buy<s%> any <S%H5315>soul<s%> with his <S%H3701>money,<s%> he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of it, and he that is <S%H3211>born<s%> in his <S%H1004>house:<s%> they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of his <S%H3899>meat.<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> also be married to a <S%H376>stranger,<s%> <S%H2114><s%> she may not <S%H398>eat<s%> of an <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> things.

But <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> be a <S%H490>widow,<s%> or <S%H1644>divorced,<s%> and have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2233>child,<s%> and is <S%H7725>returned<s%> to her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> as in her <S%H5271>youth,<s%> she shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H3899>meat:<s%> but there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2114>stranger<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> thing <S%H7684>unwittingly,<s%> then he shall <S%H3254>put<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part thereof to it, and shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> with the <S%H6944>holy<s%> thing.
And they shall not <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> things of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7311>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%>

Or <S%H5375>suffer<s%> them to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H819>trespass,<s%> when they <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H6944>holy<s%> things: for I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H376>Whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> he be of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that will <S%H7126>offer<s%> his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5088>vows,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5071>freewill<s%> offerings, <S%H834>which<s%> they will <S%H7126>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering;
You shall offer at your own <S%H7522>will<s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> of the <S%H1241>beeves,<s%> of the <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> or of the <S%H5795>goats.<s%>
But <S%H3605>whatever<s%> has a <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> that shall you not <S%H7126>offer:<s%> for it shall not be <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> for you.

And <S%H376>whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H7126>offers<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H6381>accomplish<s%> his <S%H5088>vow,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5071>freewill<s%> offering in <S%H1241>beeves<s%> or <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> it shall be <S%H8549>perfect<s%> to be <S%H7522>accepted;<s%> there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3971>blemish<s%> therein.

<S%H5788>Blind,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7665>broken,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2782>maimed,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> having a running <S%H2990>sore,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1618>scurvy,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3217>scabbed,<s%> you shall not <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> an offering by fire of them on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Either a <S%H7794>bullock<s%> or a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> that has any thing <S%H8311>superfluous<s%> or <S%H7038>lacking<s%> in his parts, that may you <S%H6213>offer<s%> for a <S%H5071>freewill<s%> offering; but for a <S%H5088>vow<s%> it shall not be <S%H7521>accepted.<s%>

You shall not <S%H7126>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that which is <S%H4600>bruised,<s%> or <S%H3807>crushed,<s%> or <S%H5423>broken,<s%> or <S%H3772>cut;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> any offering thereof in your <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> from a <S%H1121>stranger's<s%> <S%H5236><s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall you <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of your <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> of <S%H428>these;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> their <S%H4893>corruption<s%> is in them, and <S%H3971>blemishes<s%> be in them: they shall not be <S%H7521>accepted<s%> for you.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

When a <S%H7794>bullock,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5795>goat,<s%> is <S%H3205>brought<s%> <S%H3205>forth,<s%> then it shall be <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H517>dam;<s%> and from the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H1973>thereafter<s%> it shall be <S%H7521>accepted<s%> for an offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And whether it be <S%H7794>cow,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7716>ewe,<s%> you shall not <S%H7819>kill<s%> it and her <S%H1121>young<s%> both in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
And <S%H3588>when<s%> you will <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2076>offer<s%> it at your own <S%H7522>will.<s%>

On the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> it shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> up; you shall <S%H3498>leave<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of it <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morrow:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Therefore shall you <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall you <S%H2490>profane<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name;<s%> but I will be <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which <S%H6942>hallow<s%> you,
That <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to be your <S%H430>God:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
